title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 78.5 - Display of business certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 78.5 - Display of business certificate

State Regulations

The official business certificate of registration (form
MV-61U) must be displayed conspicuously in the dealer's place of business. This
certificate is issued in addition to the regular registration stubs which
accompany the dealer or transporter plates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
78.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
